name: Taleemul Quran Radio
description:
تعلیم القرآن راډيو په کندهار کې، یوه خپلواکه شخصي او داسلامې معلوماته باوري سرچینه،
پر ۹۲،۹ ایف ایم څپو.

name: Radio Srood
description: Radio Srood app is an internet radio station streaming live Afghan music 24/7 with high-quality music on your phone.

name: AFGHAN RADIO STATION
description: افغان انتر نیتي را ډیو د افغان سندرو غاړو په ښکلو غږونږ کې ښکلي پښتو سندري

name: Radio Ariana
description: Ariana News TV & News Radio are country’s leading news channels with 24/7 transmission throughout Afghanistan via satellite and terrestrial network. Ariana news is committed to provide 24/7 most updated and unbiased news to its viewers/listeners on politics, sports, business, health and entertainment from Afghanistan and the world.

name: Radio Killid
description:
TKG operates the Radio Killid Network with local stations in Kabul, Mazar, Kandahar, Jelalabad,Ghazni, Khost and Herat.  In 2010 TKG launched Afghanistan’s first radio station dedicated to Rock ‘n’ Roll. The Radio Killid Network’s unique blend of public service-oriented programming (cultural, political, developmental and educational programs), news, entertainment and music reaches millions of listeners and many of its original programs and public service announcements are shared with other, smaller and financially strapped, community radio stations throughout rural Afghanistan. In an environment where the media was formerly controlled by the state, suppressed or nonexistent beyond city centers, the growth of TKG during Afghanistan’s critical transition from war to peace has served as a valuable asset for all those dedicated to building a peaceful and open society. 
TKG’s audience reach is demographically, geographically and numerically broad. In addition to the Radio Killid Network, TKG manages a partnership of 28 affiliate stations across the country.

name: Spogmai Radio
description: سپگمی راډیو د افغانستان څخه خپرونی کوی. سپوممي راډیو د مختلفو عربي موسیقۍ او خبرو خپرونه کوي. سپوممی راډیو دواړه په آنلاین کې موسيقي او پروګرامونه چلوي. سپوممي راډیو 24 ساعته اوه بجې ده آنلاین راډیو.

name: BFBS Afghanistan
description: BFBS started broadcasting in Afghanistan in 2001. It was 8 years later at 0630 on October 26th 2009 that the immortal words ‘Goooooood morning Afghanistan’ were uttered and the live and local service was launched. Non stop music, news and information on the main channel with our daily Breakfast Show and Ops Connection programme as well as the 4 hour Access All Areas programme on Sunday lunchtime linking family and friends across the Forces world - including the UK on DAB digital radio.

name: Radio Salam Watandar
description: Radio Salam Watandar is a online music radio station. Radio Salam Watandar broadcasts to the regions 24 hours a day, 12 months of the year. With a great mix of jazz, blues, folk, world and classical music. Radio Salam Watandar has something for all discerning music lovers.

name: Radio Jawanan
description: Radio	Jawanan	is a private radio station, broadcasting nationwide on	one	single	frequency - 97.5 FM.

name: Taleemul Islam Radio
description:
Taleemul Islam Radio is an innovative, trusted, local educational FM radio that is committed to spread Islamic and different fields of scientific education and public awareness programs. It has the commitment to bringing unity, well-being and good deeds amongst the fellow human beings.
	Show more

name: Pamir Radio
description: Pamir Radio is an internet radio station that streaming live Pamiri music 24/7 with high-quality music on your phone. Download our free iOS and Android app and enjoy listening to Pamiri music wherever you go in the world.

name: ATN News FM
description: The most leading news channel in Afghanistan, providing reliable news of 34 provinces of the country & the world, hot discussions, investigative reports...

name: Radio Afghanistan International
description: Radio Afghanistan International is the first 24/7 news channel for Afghanistan that covers the breaking and latest news around the world.
